products.description: Symbol of lightness and delicacy, the hummingbird evokes curiosity and joy. Studio Design' PolyFaune collection features classic products with colorful patterns, inspired by the traditional japanese origamis. To wear with a chino or jeans. The sublimation textile printing process provides an exceptional color rendering and a color, guaranteed overtime.
products.description_short: Regular fit, round neckline, short sleeves. Made of extra long staple pima cotton.
products.name: Hummingbird printed t-shirt
